findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward(), _getCurrentSupply, and addToBlackList() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are long excluded addresses lists.

findings.title: Potential out of gas in addToBlackList() function
findings.description: The function addToBlackList() uses a loop to add addresses from the function argument to blacklist and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long addresses list.

findings.title: Potential out of gas in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Potential out of gas in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
